none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on December 20, 2015 Description from Terminal Escape:
1987 recording of tracks that would be included on the More Fun Than An Open Casket Funeral full length. Fast, anxious crossover thrash from a band at their absolute prime - when these dudes were firing on all cylinders the result was scary. Worth noting that this is presented as a four song promo, one of which is scrawled out by hand on the cover...but there are five songs. Hey man, beer helps. 4-SONG PROMO

seo.title: Acc端sed - 4-Song Promo - Terminal Escape
